post.summary: generate data by one-dimensional dynamic model

parameters.name: spec
parameters.description:
Generate data by dynamic model where **type** is required and **format** is optional
Suitable combination: **number** (*<skipped>* | **float** | **double**), **integer** (*<skipped>* | **int32** | **int64**), (*<skipped>* | **date** | **date-time**)

200.description: Result generated data for each field passed to handler
